summary: SummaryHanskin's Vitamin C Glow Powder Cleanser is an antioxidant enzyme formula that transforms into a brightening creamy cleanser when you add water.
details: DetailsBenefitsTwo-in-one exfoliator and cleanser is safe to use on sensitive skin typesDeeply cleanses pores and dissolves impuritiesSoftens and smooths out uneven skin textureBoosts skin brightness and glowKey IngredientsVitamin C (Ascorbic Acid): A potent antioxidant that improves the appearance of fine lines, dark spots and uneven skin tonePapaya Enzyme: Rejuvenates, softens and brightens skin by exfoliating dead cellsFormulated WithoutTalcSulfatesSiliconesArtificial FragrancesItem 2568281How To UseDispense a quarter-sized amount of powder into wet hands. Rub hands together to create a lather and massage onto the face for one minute, avoiding the eye area. Rinse thoroughly with warm water.Precautions: For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. If any adverse reaction occurs, discontinue use and consult a doctor if symptoms persist. Do not use on burned or broken skin. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place. Replace cap after use.IngredientsZea Mays (Corn) Starch, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Sodium Lauroyl Glutamate, Diglycerin, Maltodextrin, Papain, Ascorbic Acid.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Dispense a quarter-sized amount of powder into wet hands. Rub hands together to create a lather and massage onto the face for one minute, avoiding the eye area. Rinse thoroughly with warm water.Precautions: For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. If any adverse reaction occurs, discontinue use and consult a doctor if symptoms persist. Do not use on burned or broken skin. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place. Replace cap after use.

reviews.headline: Wonderful product
reviews.comments: I never write reviews, but i thought this one deserved a little review! Although it is a little on the expensive side, a little goes a long way and lathers very nice. So it will last you longer than the usual face gel cleaner. It leaves my skin feeling super clean and soft and has a nice light scent too. I would definitely recommed purchasing it if you are on thr fence like i was, it was worth it!

reviews.headline: Very impressed
reviews.comments: I got a sample if this and decided to finally use it. I always test my products by not doing my regular skin routine afterwards. Used in the am and it's now well into the night and my skin is super soft and my pores look smaller. I am definitely planning on purchasing now with such a great price point as this is not a face cleanser I will daily since it is an exfoliate. I have combo sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: If you have oily skin with enlarged pores,
reviews.comments: First time using this product, it gently deep clean my skin and definitely minimize the pores at the same time. The skin feels soft and looks amazing. Definitely will be ordering again.

reviews.headline: Love the cleansing line of this brand
reviews.comments: I became a fan of this brand after I tried their cleansing balm and oil(BHA). First time using this cleanser, it gently deep cleanses my pores and minimizes them at the same time. The skin feels soft and looks amazing. Definitely will be ordering again.

reviews.headline: EXTRAORDINARY
reviews.comments: Stellar - wholly stellar.  This is terrific.  I love using it mixed with only water or mixed in with a few drops of a honey-based gel cleanser I use.  Provides a most thorough yet gentle cleanse.  Skin is left glowing, fresh, smooth.  I now consider this to be one of the very finest facial cleansers I have ever had the great fortune of discovering.  This is a real keeper.  May it never be reformulated (it is perfect, folks).  And may it never,  ever stop being produced.

reviews.headline: Love, love, love
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this face wash.  Was not sure how I would feel about it as I've never used a powder face wash before.  It gives a gentle exfoliation in the very begining but then quickly turns to a creamy/foaming face wash with water.  This used to be sold in my local store but now is only online.  I buy 2 to 3 bottles each time.

reviews.headline: Had high hopes
reviews.comments: I love that it's powder but for my skin I found it very harsh. It dried out my skin and over time my face became flaky. There is another company that I tried that is powder form and it was extremely hydrating. But I wanted to try a Korean brand. Disappointed. Maybe better for less sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: Great product, all you need
reviews.comments: I really like this cleanser. I just got it, but already I can tell it's good. I went to a party, had lots of eye makeup and foundation on, and in one wash this got everything off and my skin felt clear and clean.

reviews.headline: This has been a great product for my skin!
reviews.comments: My skin is glowing and very even toned! I have acne prone skin that's also slightly oily and after using this for roughly 2-3 weeks, I noticed my skin was brighter and softer, dark spots were slowly fading away. I'm about to buy my second bottle!

reviews.headline: Favorite face wash I've ever used!
reviews.comments: This stuff is amazing! I bought it on boxycharm from their shop because a powder face wash sounded crazy, very happy I did. I use a face sponge instead of just my hands/fingers. It makes my face so smooth and doesn't dry it out, brightens and smooths my skin. I will never use another face wash again!

reviews.headline: Skincare staple
reviews.comments: I stumbled across this gem in one of my boxycharm boxes. I have since repurchased several times. I love it. It definitely brightens and helps get rid of post acne hyperpigmentation.

reviews.headline: First time trying and LOVE
reviews.comments: First time trying this out normally I use the dermatologica microexfoliant powder face wash cleanser but this stuff is just as great and gets a much better lather! It smell isn't bad I think it's normal soapy smell. My favorite part compared to dermatologica is the cap lid on the Hanskin powder cleanser! I'll buy this again soon but for now enjoying my new product:)

reviews.headline: Gentle and effective.
reviews.comments: Initially received this as a sample and I fell in love with it. Little product goes a long way and my skin always feels super soft and clean after using it. Quickly became a staple product for me.

reviews.headline: How is this legal
reviews.comments: Okay, so I rarely do reviews but HAD to review this product. I've made it half way through my first bottle and I'm sad I've never used this product before. Just after my first use I saw such a brightening difference. I first cleanse with the Hanskin pore cleansing oil then second cleanse with this and it has saved my skin. I had very textured and dull skin and now I don't even need foundation most days because I'm that confident in my skin. It's a soft exfoliant that really does that job, leaving my skin smooth and glowing all on its own. I finish with ROC vitamin C gel and I'm out the door. This is a must buy for any person with textured skin !

reviews.headline: An Exfoliating cleanser that doesn't irritate my skin
reviews.comments: I love this product…it is a lot in the bottle and you only need a little bit to cleanse and exfoliate…for the price I would say…it's very good. I don't care about brands, packaging, smell, price etc… once it works I'll get it… and this is simply amazing!! I'll purchase again!!

reviews.headline: Great face wash
reviews.comments: Very gentle powder cleanser. I use this 3 times per week. It lathers nicely and I feel it's very effective in cleaning without stripping my aged skin. I love it and would repurchase.

reviews.headline: Praise be this cleanser
reviews.comments: I have dry skin and have a hard time removing dead skin (gross but true). I was shocked beyond the grave when this weird powder cleanser broke up that stubborn skin cement layer. I have normal skin under there?! heck yes!!

reviews.headline: Perfect face wash
reviews.comments: I love the way this makes my skin glow! It is fun to use for a kid at heart like me but it certainly works it's claim. I use this in alternate with a powder rice wash.

reviews.headline: My all-time favorite powder cleanser
reviews.comments: I stumbled upon this product one day and I am so glad I did. It is the perfect second-step cleanser! I have acne-prone skin so I tend to be sensitive to new products, but this made my skin noticeably softer and helps with redness. My skin used to get horribly red when I broke out but with this product, it is much calmer. The gentle exfoliation is perfect and it is awesome to use after a pre-cleanse. I would absolutely recommend this!

reviews.headline: Best face cleanser of 2021
reviews.comments: My skin is very sensitive and I have a hard time finding a cleanser that I feel deeply cleanses my oily skin without irritation. This cleanser is definitely the right balance for me!

properties.name: Pros

values.label: Gentle, smells good, a little goes a long way

display_values: Gentle, smells good, a little goes a long way

faceoff_positive.comments: So I'm used to using facial powder washes so the application isn't anything too weird for me. You just wet your hands, put about a quarter sized amount in your palm then use your other hand to begin lathering. Even if I happen to have a few pieces not already dissolved, when I begin lathering on my wet face the wash does not feel abrasive at all. It's also really nice because my face feels clean and hydrated unlike that harsh, stripped feeling I usually get. Like I've been using this and honestly my face feels/looks like I actually drink a lot of water. I'm really happy giving this product a try since I couldn't even find reviews for this online and it's such a good 2nd step cleanser. So long as Ulta doesn't run out, I'm going to keep on buying this! Also as a note, these types of cleansers last a long time so even with the nearly $30 price point, it's still a bargain considering this will last me at least 4-6 months and I wash my face 2x a day.
faceoff_positive.headline: My favorite 2nd step cleanser from Ulta

faceoff_negative.comments: I have mixed feelings over this product and I'll elaborate some more. I have combination and acne-prone skin and was looking forward to using this product. The product was travel friendly and the idea was good, but my skin did not agree with it. I liked that when you added warm water, it foamed really nicely, but I did not like the smell. It was almost like plastic and chemicals which was definitely not the best sensorial experience. After a week or two of use, I noticed that my skin became really irritated and red (itchy). It felt like I had a large reaction that dwindled down after some time passed. Normally, my skin does not behave like this, so I decided to remove this product from my routine and the redness was gone. I identified this product of being the root of the cause and think that I might have a Vitamin C reaction in general. If you are looking to buy this product, look into it some more and make sure you don't have reactions to Vitamin C. Note that this product is definitely not a product that you should be dependent on for receiving Vitamin C because you would not receive a lot of benefits from this. Overall, it was okay, but I personally will not be purchasing again.
faceoff_negative.headline: I would not purchase again...here are my thoughts...
